title: 3 Bedroom Doublewide Manufactured Home for Rent
app_fee: Community Application fee based on number of adults on application.
posting_body: If you’re looking for a beautiful place to call home, consider Oakland Glens, a well-maintained, all-ages, manufactured home community.
Our community is located on the Novi and Walled Lake border, giving you direct access to so many great local offerings!
Public access to Walled Lake, shopping, dining and entertainment options all located with just a few miles.
Right now, we have a 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home with 1568 sq feet of space in Novi.
That’s a deal worth investing in!
